name: Edge Of Eternity
description: Wage epic turn-based battles as you follow Daryon and Selene on their quest to find a cure to the all-consuming Corrosion in this grand tale of hope and sacrifice.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64 bits Processor: Intel i5 6400 (2.7ghz) Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 670 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 8 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 64 bits Processor: Intel i7 6700 (4.0ghz) Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 980 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 8 GB available space
